title: The Sonic Resonance of Hubert Ward
summary: Hubert Ward, a young composer with a secret sonic superpower, saves his city from a mysterious villain using his unique abilities.
summaryGerman: Hubert Ward, ein junger Komponist mit einer geheimen Schall-Superkraft, rettet seine Stadt vor einem mysteriösen Bösewicht mit seinen einzigartigen Fähigkeiten.
summaryDutch: Hubert Ward, een jonge componist met een geheime sonische superkracht, redt zijn stad van een mysterieuze schurk met zijn unieke vaardigheden.
summaryFrench: Hubert Ward, un jeune compositeur doté d'un super pouvoir sonique secret, sauve sa ville d'un vilain mystérieux grâce à ses capacités uniques.

story.text: Hubert Ward, a 19-year-old with a passion for music, discovers he can manipulate sound waves while composing a new piece. This revelation leaves him both astonished and excited.
Trying out his newfound abilities, Hubert rescues a kitten stuck at the top of a tall tree by calming it with a soothing melody, lifting the pet gently with a sound wave.
Hubert encounters a group of thieves robbing a local store. He uses a powerful, disorienting sound blast to stop them in their tracks and waits for the police to arrive.
A mysterious figure challenges Hubert, revealing that they too can manipulate sound. A high-stakes sonic battle ensues in an abandoned warehouse.
Hubert struggles with the aftermath of his first superhero battle, feeling overwhelmed and unsure. He seeks solace in composing, which helps him process his emotions.
Determined to understand more, Hubert researches sound frequencies and experiments with new ways to harness his powers, becoming more adept and confident.
The mysterious figure returns, but this time Hubert is ready. Using a symphony of soundwaves, he neutralizes the threat, saving a crowd during a city festival.

ending: In the quiet after the battle, Hubert Ward felt a symphony of peace and purpose resonate within him.
moral: Even unlikely talents can lead to extraordinary destinies.
